channel.title: Hamachi Server Up for 5 hours more! Runescape 3.0 (317 pi, not trisidiax!) old
channel.description:
[size=18pt]LOGMEIN HAMACHI Id- 2007scape or 2007scape 2 pass- 123 or 123[/size]
Combat
PvP fully complete PvN fully complete Perfect max hit formulas good accuracy formula Some weapon special attack Equipment effects (i.e. barrows amrour and weapons) Equipment requirements Weapon poisoning
Magic
Every modern combat spell Every ancient combat spell Can't mage through walls Staves that give unlimited amount of runes working Charge w/ godspells Weakening spells Teleblock/binding/freezing
Ranged
Bows/arrows Throwing weapons (knives, darts, javelins, throwing axes) Crossbows (the regular one and karil's) Can't shoot through walls Ranged distances
Prayer
All bones bury-able Every prayer working properly Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
Mining
All ores can be mined Correct pickaxe finding and animations Prospecting Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms
Smithing
Some bars can be made Some bars can be forged into items Some equipment can be produced Correct animations, interfaces and objects used
Fishing
All fish can be caught Big net fishing Vessel fishing(put a raw karambwan as a bait in the vessel and catch karambwan) Correct item requirements Fishing spots located all around the world Correct animations Moving fishing locations Fishing Platform
Cooking
Meats Flour collecting Bread Pies Stews Pizzas Cakes Wine Hot drinks Potatoes Diary Brew making Eating food (in pieces) Correct animation and timing used
Woodcutting
Stumps and regrowing trees Correct hatchet finding Correct hatchet animations All trees cut-able Correct fell chance algorithms Birds nest falling out
Firemaking
All logs light able Adding and depleting of lightened logs Firelighters Pyre log firemaking mort'ton temple(making sacred oil) Sacred oil to make pyre logs(correct doses) All lighting sources Colored fires "Backward" firelighting Ashes appear after logs burn out Correct animations Clipped
Agility
Gnome, Wilderness, Pyramid and Brimhaven courses usable Run energy affected(weight + level) Force movement mask Correct animations used
Herblore
Correct animations Herb Identifying All potions can be made Correct first and secondary ingredients Coconut making Item grinding(pestle use) Poisoning weapons(all types) Can pour doses into other potions (must be the same potion)
Thieving
NPC thievery working with correct stunning formula Can thieve from stalls and can get caught by surrounding guards Doors lockpicking and chests Correct animations and graphics used
Crafting
Cutting gems Making amulets, necklaces, and rings Stringing amulets and necklaces Tanning normal, hard, and dragon hide Crafting normal, hard, snakeskin, and dragon hide Crafting snakeskin Spinning wool and flax Making pottery Attaching studs
Runecrafting
Use of the Abyss Rock mining Tendrils chopping Boil burning Eyes distracting Gap crossing Passage Skulled when entering Prayer drained to 0 Dark mage repairing pouches
All altars working Correct multiple crafting Use of Pouches included Talismans "pull" to altars Tiaras enchanting Combining runes and their uses Mist runes Dust runes Mud runes Smoke runes Steam runes Lava runes Binding necklace(100% of combining rune if wielded, and has 15 charges)
Fletching
All logs can be fletched Option interface for short or long bow (shafts if normal log) Can string bows Can make bolt-tips Darts Brutal arrows making Bow stringing Can make arrows
Slayer
All slayer masters Every monsters added for every tasks Burthorpe tasks Canifis tasks Edgeville tasks Lost city tasks Shilo village tasks Tips on killing monsters 'Special monsters' requires a specific slayer level and equipment to slay Slayer shops All slayer masters working Can ask for an easier task at burthorpe if you have a too hard task All equipment working Item that finishes off some monsters Equipment that are required to fight some monsters
Special monsters(Zygomite and mogre) Slayer gem working
Farming
NONE!
Minigames
Duel Arena Fight Caves (JAD has waves) Barrows Pest Control
--------------------MEDIA!! :D HOORAY HOORAY!---------------------- #Note this is 100% my pics! [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2wn5lpv.jpg[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/28rl14z.jpg[/img] [img]http://[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2s78bqp.jpg[/img] http://i46.tinypic.com/28sxy0o.jpg[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/ohjocl.jpg[/img] Eww! New Barrows making it like old Barrows! Blame Adam! Sexy Old Barrows added By Me and Adam! Home! With little npcs :( Me! When Click on a skill a skill menu pops up! Finally :D! Jonas
------------------End of Media------------------------------------
------------------Credits------------------- Credits Adam(Co Founder) Game Designer Jonas(Co Founder) Sprites Developer Me Carlos (Founder of TeamVictoryGames Inc.) Game Designer Sanity - For Base (THANK YOU) Luna-Scape- nice motherlover *And no one else* We started this from scratch as in nothing no cache barely a folder called client and source

learn to read before you write something stupid.
